response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between the perceived value of the product by both parties, aiming to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate a successful partnership.", "product_price": 1100000}
